content.title: Product Daily Check-in
content.visibleText:
Product Daily Check-in
Thu, Jun 4, 2020 | 13:00 - 13:45
Recap
Deep Dive | Coaching

Summary
The meeting revolved around the team's feedback on video content, simplifying the company's communication strategy with clients, and creating high-quality, impactful videos focused on client and visitor communication strategy. The team discussed the challenges associated with customer education, venting with the aftermath of customers' interpretation to driver videos and the need to align product management with the universe journey. The challenges discussed in regards of customers outreach initiatives, focusing on the scheduling of customers and the clarity associated the spacing out time to customer feedback. The team emphasized the importance of clear communication and the potential for improvement in customer outreach processes.

Chapters & Topics
Discussion on Video Content and Feedback 00:01
Simplifying Communication Strategy 00:05
Communication Strategy with Clients

Action Items
George Data will include insights from customer feedback in the rollout MPS for all customers
George Data will broadcast to all customers and include proof of customer upgrade preferences in the outreach #219
George Data will send an email to schedule an interview with customers using AI discourse features.

View more

content.title: Product Daily Check-in
content.visibleText:
Product Daily Check-in
Thu, May 7, 2020 Â· 1:30pm - 2:30pm
Recap
Deep Dive
Coaching
Notes
Transcript
product daily check-in
Summary
The meeting began with George Data initiating a conversation about utilizing AI to streamline the process of product onboarding by extracting crucial details from conversations, then training the AI to automate customer benefit feature development, expected benefits for various data, and telemetry-derived depictions of streaming simulations intensive use, generating initial customer contacts. Data provided detailed guidance on the importance of focusing on specific and essential, particularly in the contents of Magnus creation, and emphasized the need to ask concrete questions and describe important information with brackets.
Chapters & Topics
Discussion on AI and data structure for product onboarding
AI Implementation for Product Onboarding
Navigating Data Structure and Templates
Action Items
George Data will discuss the ideas for AI implementation and gather feedback from the team.
George Data will refine the interview structure and email strategy for customer engagement.
Firat Gomi will develop an AI Customer Advisory Board program and early adoption strategy.
View more

content.title: ChatGPT
content.visibleText:
1. Customer Insight Analysis:
 - Analyzing customer usage data to identify trends and preferences.
 - Developing content that addresses common customer concerns about data privacy and compliance (Q3).
2. Feature Development and Testing:
 - Conducting Wizard of Oz experiments to test new features with customers without full-scale implementation.
 - Rapid prototyping and proof of concept development to gather early feedback.
 - It Worked.
3. Follow-up Emails:
 - Follow-up emails showed improved engagement, with some customers responding and opening the emails multiple times (Q1).
4. Calendar Invites:
 - Direct calendar invites to customers led to better engagement and meeting acceptance.
5. Human-like Search Interface:
 - Customers appreciated the more human-like interface of the new search functionality, which improved their experience.
6. Educational Content:
 - Educational videos.
